nodes.text: Rwookrrorro was an inland tree city of Kashyyyk.

Located several hundred kilometers of Kachirho, in an area of exceptionally tall wroshyr trees, Rwookrrorro reached up through the canopies. Therefore, it was visible to approaching starships, unlike most Wookiee cities and other settlements, which were largely hidden. The spaceport, located on the fringes of the city, was one of the few structures where metal was used more than wood.

It was the birth place of Chewbacca and Sagwa, who protected its people from Imperial soldiers being he was imprisoned and enslaved. Attichitcuk, Chewbacca's mother and several of Chewbacca's cousins lived in Rwookrrorro.
